title: Lydia the Warrior Princess: A Fairy Tale about Music and Compassion
description: Lydia the warrior princess is the pride and joy of her kingdom, having defeated monsters and enemy warriors alike. But when an old man comes to teach her the harp, she faces an unexpected challenge. Will this mighty warrior princess dare to play such a gentle instrument?Follow Lydia on her journey to find out.
author: Madalina Hubert
